agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Industry TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted. Tuesday, April 23, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Trey Martinez Fischer The committee will meet to hear invited testimony from a Texas business leader regarding the Texas business climate and industry trends. After that, the committee will hear public testimony on the following: HB 589 Deshotel | et al. Relating to mechanic's, contractor's, or materialman's liens; authorizing a fee; changing the eligibility for community supervision. HB 1025 Bohac Relating to candidacy for and membership on the board of certain property owners' associations. HB 1976 Vo Relating to liability for obtaining improper unemployment compensation benefits. HB 2242 Vo Relating to the classification of workers for purposes of the Texas Unemployment Compensation Act; providing an administrative penalty. HB 2302 Bonnen, Greg Relating to regulation by a property owners' association of certain religious displays. HB 2761 Murr Relating to the labeling of beef and pork products; providing a civil penalty. HB 3445 King, Tracy O. Relating to declarant control of certain property owners' associations. HB 3498 Burrows Relating to mechanic's, contractor's, or materialman's liens. HB 3556 Farrar Relating to notice to a prospective residential tenant regarding a dwelling that is located in a floodplain or that has been damaged by flooding. HB 3569 Farrar Relating to the dissemination of eviction case information. HB 4307 Vo Relating to housing discrimination under the Texas Fair Housing Act. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
